summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2808 for the improvement of Twelfth Avenue Northwest, from West Eighty-third Street to West Eighty-fifth Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same; constructing curbs and gutters, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 33750, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
